text: Aristide von Bienefeldt (24 October 1959 â€“ 16 January 2016) was a Dutch writer. He wrote about gay rights and marriage equality. His first novel - Bekentenissen van een Stamhouder ("Confessions of a Son and Heir") got positive reviews by the Dutch and the Flemish press because of its homosexual passages. Von Bienefeldt died in The Hague, Netherlands at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== * von Bienefeldt's website Category:1959 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Dutch LGBT people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT novelists Category:Writers from Rotterdam
title: Aristide von Bienefeldt
